vulnerability.name: USN-4896-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4896-1 fixed a vulnerability in lxml. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that lxml incorrectly handled certain HTML attributes. A  remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform cross-site  scripting (XSS) attacks.

statements.status_notes: lxml could allow cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
